guide.message: Set data options using Chart Setting Button.

param.query:
SELECT *, substr(createdate,1,10) AS date, 
CASE WHEN substr(createdate,13,1) = ':' 
     THEN ('0'||substr(createdate,12,1)) 
     ELSE substr(createdate,12,2) END AS inout_hour	 
FROM #{DF(0)}
